page.title: 08POLESDEN LACY
page.content: It is 1\ m SW of Great Bookham, off the A246 Leatherhead-Guildford:(the road via West Humble off Dorking - Leatherhead A24 is neither suitable for coaches, nor recommended for cars), it was originally a Regency Villa enlarged in the early 1900's to become an elegant Edwardian country house set in spacious grounds. Open April to end of October daily 2-6pm, except Monday and Friday.(last admissions 5.30) and Bank Holiday Mondays 11-6, closed following Tuesday.Also open weekends March and November: 2-5pm.(last admission 4.30) Garden open daily 11 - sunset. Admission: Garden only 90p. House 90p extra, Children under 17 half price, under 5 free. Bookings: Administrator, Polesden Lacy Dorking, Surrey (tel Bookham 58203 or 52048)
